channel.title: Admins?
channel.description:
how do i make me and other people admins on my server??
can any1 help me??:

item.title: Admins?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Lol, umm i said thats for him. Plus i did provide information on how to make other people admins, which is possibly the gayest way possible but he doesn’t know much. So i said that way, your way involves too much work, imagine you have over 5k char files, it would be a pain to look for 1 single char file, when you can just make a command. I know its in alphabetical order, but still.

[quote=“Yxer, post:1, topic:166003”]He made a poll for some crap question like this.
I prefer no one helping him until he decides to stop being a total asshole.
One more suggestion for both of you, Grow up.[/quote]

Are you talking to me?

Read full topic

item.title: Admins?
item.dc:creator: @pu123_5k1ll3 pu123 5k1ll3
item.description:
@pu123_5k1ll3 wrote:

[quote=“Yxer, post:1, topic:166003”]He made a poll for some crap question like this.
I prefer no one helping him until he decides to stop being a total asshole.[/quote]
noone cares about the dam poll so stop mentioning it.

and its easier to go into a char file and change it rather than editing client.java every time there is a new admin.

Read full topic

item.title: Admins?
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch™, post:7, topic:166001”][quote author=iceman327 link=topic=225125.msg1940323#msg1940323 date=1198115723]

In the initialize method, put:

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“YourName”)) {
playerRights = 3;
}

In other words, you know where your welcome message is? Put it under that.

Or Just search:

Start of mod and add your name there.

Are you retarded, i made that for him, or do you not see: “Your Name” ?

If he wanted to make people admins, he just has to make a command, instead of your way, which tbh is gay and primitive. But its what i think, so don’t take it personally.

Tbh he asked for admin, and you gave him owner
He might not like having his admins owners and being able to ban him.

Okay so just go into the characters folder
Find the guy you want to make an admin
and under player rights change the 0 into a 2 for admin
1=mod
3=owner
[/quote][/quote]

Yeah I’m totally retarded when he asked how to make admin and not owner.
Gtfo nerd go beat to pixel boobies

Read full topic

item.title: Admins?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

[quote=“pu123 5k1ll3, post:3, topic:166001”]go into the person’s character file in the character folder.

step by step:

1: make sure they are lgged out
2:go to the person’s file and open
3: search for character-rights = 0 and change to 2 for admin or 3 for owner
4: save the file close it and exit out of char files
5: let person on and let them have fun[/quote]

Eww. Primitive.

b boyz 4:

what???

Pff, nvm.

Read full topic

item.title: Admins?
item.dc:creator: @pu123_5k1ll3 pu123 5k1ll3
item.description:
@pu123_5k1ll3 wrote:

go into the person’s character file in the character folder.

step by step:

1: make sure they are lgged out
2:go to the person’s file and open
3: search for character-rights = 0 and change to 2 for admin or 3 for owner
4: save the file close it and exit out of char files
5: let person on and let them have fun

Read full topic
